raw_comment:
What do you notice?

I noticed that generations are getting better when where places are more developed. Younger people are more optimistic rather than old. Today youth is developing better than generations in the past.

What do you wonder?

I wonder why we sent all getting better the same way. I feel that the development of the world is the same, so why are countries struggling. 

How does this relate to you and your community?

I live in the US, which means that my country is developing very well. I feel like my generation is so different in a good way. My community is growing in a very good rapid way because of this new generation. 

What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.

"Today's Optimism runs the World"
ace_sentences: I notice that generations become better when places are more developed.
Younger people are more optimistic than older people.
The youth of today develops better than the generations of the past.
I wonder why all countries get better in the same way.
I think that the development of the world is the same.
I wonder why some countries struggle.
I feel that my generation is different in a good way.
I think that my community grows rapidly because of the new generation.
The headline is: Today's Optimism runs the World.
